price: This is so. And whoever honors the rituals of Allah, it is from the piety of the hearts.
arabic: ذَٰلِكَۖ وَمَن يُعَظِّمۡ شَعَٰٓئِرَ ٱللَّهِ فَإِنَّهَا مِن تَقۡوَى ٱلۡقُلُوبِ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
